accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA. Gold text on white is often failing - use darker gold (#B49020) for text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.font_sizing: Allow font scaling. Default body text should be at least 16px (text-base) or 18px (text-lg) for reading content.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to the main CSS file immediately.
2. THEME SETUP: Implement the 'dark' class strategy in Tailwind. Default to system preference but offer a toggle.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'zinc' look. Add the gold borders and glass effects.
4. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Tetris' grid layout. Do not just stack sections. Use the stained glass texture as a subtle background for the 'Mysteries' section.
5. PRAYER INTERFACE: This is the core. It must be distraction-free. Use a dark modal or full-screen view with large text and the 'bead' counter prominent.
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and for the 'bead' movement simulation.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
